nodes.text: Reecee was a planet in the Inner Rim, located near the Utegetu Nebula.

Reecee was a heaven for smugglers during the New Republic era. Shortly before the Yuuzhan Vong War, Han Solo traveled to the Riebold's Foam and Sizzle cantina on Reecee to gain information on Lando Calrissian's operation at Dubrillion.

During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the Yuuzhan Vong conquered the planet shortly before taking Coruscant in 27 ABY. The attack generated large amounts of New Republic casualties, with only several Y-wing and A-wing battle groups escaping the carnage.
